title: Signage from the 70's
content:
Hi. I have been trying to match this typeface for some time now. It is the signage at our local planatarium. We are in the process of re-branding it, but would want to incorpoarate this somewhere.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [planet.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107161859/http:/typophile.com/files/planet.jpg) | 74.34 KB |
author: Gustav Greffrath

comments.content: Also [Giza](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107161859/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/giza/) and [Austin Antique](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107161859/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/austin-antique/) which have sharper corners.
That is really nice. Where is it, and do you have a photo showing the condensed gothic lettering above it?
Yes. I have a bigger picture. It is in Johannesburg, South Africa. Really beautiful place.
